plugins.name: BBUncrustifyPlugin
plugins.description: Xcode plugin to uncrustify the source code opened in the editor

plugins.name: SCXcodeMinimap
plugins.description: SCXcodeMiniMap is a plugin that adds a source editor MiniMap to Xcode.

plugins.name: DerivedData Exterminator
plugins.description: Button for quickly deleting derived data. Makes Xcode happy.

plugins.name: OMMiniXcode
plugins.description: Xcode plugin for working without the main toolbar

plugins.name: OMColorSense
plugins.description: Xcode plugin that makes working with UIColor (and NSColor) more visual.

plugins.name: OMQuickHelp
plugins.description: Plugin for Xcode to integrate the Dash documentation viewer app

plugins.name: KSImageNamed
plugins.description: Xcode plug-in that provides autocomplete for imageNamed: calls

plugins.name: HOStringSense
plugins.description: Plugin for Xcode to make working with strings less "escaped"

plugins.name: XVim
plugins.description: Xcode plugin for Vim keybindings

plugins.name: XCode4_beginning_of_line
plugins.description: XCode 4 plugin to make HOME key jump to the first non-whitespace line of code

plugins.name: Lin
plugins.description: Xcode4 plugin shows completion for NSLocalizedString

plugins.name: XCFixin_CurrentLineHighlighter
plugins.description: This fixin highlights the line currently being edited in the source editor

plugins.name: XCFixin_DisableAnimations
plugins.description: This fixin disables Xcode's various NSAnimation-based animations, such as the Show/Hide Debug Area, Show/Hide Navigator, and Show/Hide Utilities animations.

plugins.name: XCFixin_FindFix
plugins.description: This fixin makes Xcode show all find options (such as "Ignore Case") in the find bar when it opens.

plugins.name: XCFixin_HideDistractions
plugins.description: This fixin adds a "Hide Distractions" menu item to the View menu, which focuses the current editor by hiding auxiliary views and maximizing the active window. This fixin works best when the XCFixin_DisableAnimations fixin is also installed.

plugins.name: XCFixin_InhibitTabNextPlaceholder
plugins.description: This fixin disables using the tab key to select between argument placeholders of a synthesized (by Xcode's code completion) method call.

plugins.name: XCFixin_TabAcceptsCompletions
plugins.description: Upon pressing tab, this fixin makes Xcode accept the currently-highlighted completion suggestion in the popup list.

plugins.name: XCFixin_UserScripts
plugins.description: Reinstates some semblance of the Xcode 3.x User Scripts menu. See documentation in the XCFixin_UserScripts directory.

plugins.name: ShowInGithub
plugins.description: Open the related Github page of a source file directly form the Xcode editor code window.

plugins.name: XcodeAutoCloseDebug
plugins.description: Close the debug window automatically after the debug session has ended.

plugins.name: Xprop
plugins.description: Exclude @property and @synthesize document items from the navigator menu.

plugins.name: DLAutoresizeMaskPlugin
plugins.description: Vizualize autoresizing masks in the code editor.

plugins.name: DocExpander
plugins.description: Intelligent comment expansion based on DocBlockr for Sublime Text.

plugins.name: PeepOpen
plugins.description: Plugin for PeepOpen. An alternative to Open Quickly...

plugins.name: InstaCodesPlugin
plugins.description: This plug-in allows developers to post code fragments directly from Xcode IDE to Instacode - an Instagram for your code. It supports OS X 10.7 and higher + Xcode 4.x.

plugins.name: XcodeExplorer
plugins.description: This is a plugin project that allows you, as a developer, to explore the various events and notifications that Xcode4 emits during normal operations.
